debug.name: Enable Debug Info
debug.hint: Logs additional debugging information to the console

collideWalls.name: Respect Walls on Follow
collideWalls.hint: Will check if the follower would collide with a wall when moving and will temporarily leave formation if this occurs. Reposition and rejoin formation to continue following.

useCrosshairs.name: Use Crosshairs Targetting
useCrosshairs.hint: Which method for leader selection to use: the built in targeting system or the Crosshairs targeting system.

feedback.wallCollision: {tokenName}'s movement collides with a wall and has left formation. (Token [{tokenId}])
